name: ETHCC
description: The Ethereum Community Conference (EthCC) is the largest annual European Ethereum event focused on technology and community. Three intense days of conferences, networking and learning.

name: Blockchain Economy Istanbul Sum
description: Blockchain Economy Istanbul Summit is Eurasia's largest ever blockchain event bringing together the key players of crypto industry and experts to redefine the future of finance. The 4th edition of the Blockchain Economy Summit will take place during two days in Istanbul on July 27-28, 2022 with the world's top crypto companies and blockchain entrepreneurs. Istanbul is among the oldest, historically and culturally wealthy cities of the world. Since the Byzantine era the city remains to be economically, financially important trade center in the world with wide variety of promising opportunities. Today, 16% of Türkiye's population -13,6 mln people, own crypto, which makes Türkiye one of the largest crypto owning countries in the world. Thus, Blockchain Economy Istanbul Summit will be the Main gathering in the region on behalf of the world of blockchain and cryptocurrency, with a wide range of topics focused on the financial technologies of the future, extensive networking opportunities and participation from more than 55 countries.

name: Solana Hacker House | Seoul
description: The Solana Foundation x Wormhole Seoul Hacker House is a five-day OFFLINE event with in-person guidance from core Solana Labs engineers, as well as mentorship from other partners. Hacker Houses are free and open to all people (both developers and non-developers).

name: Solana Hacker House | Krakow
description: The Solana Foundation x Jump Hacker Houses is a five-day offline event with in-person guidance from core Solana Labs engineers, as well as mentorship from other partners.

name: BUIDL Asia 2022
description:
Hosted and organized by KryptoSeoul, BUIDL Asia 2022 is the ultimate opportunity to interact among developers, communities, and businesses across the globe. BUIDL Asia 2022 will provide you with the latest insights and developments from the most innovative and talented minds.

As a tech-focused conference, BUIDL Asia 2022 will focus 100% on the builders and technology and 0% on hype and speculation. BUIDL Week is mainly comprised of HackAtom Seoul, BUIDL Asia 2022 conference, and ETH Seoul. Please join us and let's BUIDL together!

name: ETH Seoul
description:
ETH Seoul 2022 is an upcoming Ethereum and blockchain-focused event that aims to bring together some of the brightest minds in the industry to discuss, redefine, and celebrate the future of blockchain. The event is expected to happen right in the heart of Seoul and will feature a series of keynotes, panel discussions, pitch competitions, investor meet-ups, and world-class networking opportunities for all those attendees.

ETH Seoul is scheduled in two phases. The first phase which is the IRL part of the event is scheduled from August 5th to August 7th. The second phase will be conducted virtually which is scheduled from August 8th to August 13th. The ETH Seoul event will be co-organized by Kryptoseoul and Dystopia Labs. Kryptoseoul is a South Korea-based community building and marketing team, headed by a group of professional communicators, marketers, and analysts. Dystopia Labs is a San Francisco-based start-up studio that focuses on blockchain events and has organized a multitude of such events.

name: KOREA BLOCKCHAIN WEEK 2022
description:
Hosted by FactBlock and co-hosted by Hashed, Korea Blockchain Week 2022 is a premier crypto and blockchain event bringing together the brightest minds of the industry to discuss, redefine, and celebrate the future of finance.

Right in the heart of Seoul, the action-packed event features inspirational keynotes, panel discussions, pitch competitions, investor meet-ups, and world-class networking opportunities for crypto enthusiasts.

name: Futurist Conference 2022
description: Join hundreds of developers for a 3-day hackathon and workshop series to build the Web3 world. A completely free community event for all those who apply. Located in a mega indoor dome connected to the conference is a perfect hub for developers to hack all night long.

name: DeFiCon
description:
DeFiCon is a nonprofit conference with a mission to elevate the ethos of peer-to-peer crypto.

DeFi, crypto, and NFT communities consist of more than only profit maximalists, degens, gamblers, and ponzi apes – they are full of daring and creative innovators. Our ecosystem thrives on accessibility, participation, building, creativity, and even a little weirdness. Peer-to-peer crypto has and will become the evolution of human organization and the future of France, open to anyone and everyone who wants to contribute.

As a nonprofit conference, the focus shifts from maximizing profit to maximizing the experience for the attendees. We will donate all proceeds above the event’s cost to charity while unifying the crypto community under one house. The goal is to ensure the value is found at our event and to inspire both new participants and people already familiar with DeFi.

name: ETHLatam
description: A 3-day event focused on tech and community. Come and join the conferences & networking with one of the most vibrant ETH communities ✨

name: WEB3CONF INDIA
description: India's first chain-agnostic web3 conference.

name: ETHMexicoCity
description: ETHMexicoCity is one you won’t want to miss. Located in the heart of the nation’s crypto scene, come prepared for a strong showing from the Mexican crypto diaspora—and a good time.

name: SUPERVERSE
description: As our attention shifts towards the digital world, our digital lives become more worth to us. SUPERVERSE discusses transformational shifts shaping the way we: create, consume, monetize and identify ourselves.

name: Solana Hacker House | Stokholm
description: The Solana Foundation x Jump Hacker Houses is a five-day offline event with in-person guidance from core Solana Labs engineers, as well as mentorship from other partners.

name: Coinfest Asia
description: Coinfest Asia is an insight & networking festival, sharing opportunities around web3, crypto, blockchain, NFT & Metaverse.

name: BitBlockBoom
description:
The BitBlockBoom! is a Bitcoin Maximalist Conference. To put it in simple terms this conference is only for people who are interested in Bitcoin.
Attendees range from people highly known and heavily involved in Bitcoin, to people who are just trying to learn what Bitcoin is all about.

You will not find anyone shilling ICO’s or Altcoins.

This is a True Bitcoin Conference.

BitBlockBoom! is not a gigantic, or super conference. This creates a wonderful atmosphere to meet and discuss Bitcoin with the speakers and other Bitcoin Maximalists.

name: ETHWarsaw
description:
Warsaw blockchain community has been very active on the global Web3 scene.
We’d like to welcome Web3 builders from all over the world to join us for a week of building, exchanging experiences & ideas here in Warsaw!

name: Dappcon
description: Dappcon provides the opportunity for co-creating the future of dapps while engaging the community in open critical discussions and experiential learning.

name: Die Bitcoin Konferenz
description: Die größte deutschsprachige Bitcoin Konferenz! September 15-17 2022, Innsbruck.

name: ETHBerlin
description: ETHBerlin, to the power of 3.

name: Australian Crypto Convention
description: Join 5,000+ attendees at Australia’s largest gathering of crypto & blockchain enthusiasts, innovators, technologists, business leaders, influencers, & global leaders.

name: Cryptoberfest
description: Joins us in our journey deep down into the rabbit whole. A pathway over 3 days that inspires your heart, brain and liver in forms never seen before.

name: Mainnet by Messari
description:
As the crypto industry continues to grow and disrupt adjacent industries, Messari strives to offer investors, developers, entrepreneurs, and newcomers alike with reliable information and data tools that help them participate intelligently in the crypto economy. Building off this ethos, we will continue to experiment with industry partners to ensure the Mainnet experience offers experiential learning, promotes collaboration & networking, and remains anchored with independent content.

Relocating to Pier 36 on the East Side of Manhattan, we are eager to design a unique experience for all attendees and build activations that align with our sponsors objectives. Budgets and target audiences may vary but we're keen on customizing each sponsor's package to best meet their needs and promote optimal engagement with all stakeholders.

name: Solana Hacker House | Singapore
description: The Solana Foundation x Jump Hacker Houses is a five-day offline event with in-person guidance from core Solana Labs engineers, as well as mentorship from other partners.

name: Zebu Live
description:
We’re gathering to celebrate the progress the Crypto, Web3, and Blockchain industry has made over the years and dive deep into how to gain mainstream adoption.

Our goal is to bring all the biggest communities together to work together towards the goal of mainstream adoption.

name: ASIA CRYPTO WEEK
description:
Asia Crypto Week is a week of various independently organised side events around TOKEN2049 Singapore, running from 26 September – 2 October 2022. The week concludes with an exceptional closing party at CE LA VIE and the F1 Singapore Grand Prix.

Expect a wide range of meetups, workshops, networking drinks and parties - creating unparalleled networking opportunities.

name: Ethereum SP
description: Ethereum Brasil is a gateway for international blockchain/Web3 projects to the Latin American region - the starting point for global projects to understand the unique landscape; to meet their communities; and, to grow their user-base.

name: TOKEN 2049
description:
TOKEN2049 is the premier crypto event, organised annually in Singapore and London, where founders and executives of the leading Web3 companies share their view on the market. We shine a light on the global developments, while taking a unique and widening perspective on the ecosystem and its vast opportunities.

​TOKEN2049 brings together the global Web3 industry, uniting entrepreneurs, investors, developers, industry insiders and global media - and creates unparalleled networking opportunities.

This is the community that will define what’s next in the space.

name: DevCon
description:
Devcon is an intensive introduction for new Ethereum explorers, a global family reunion for those already a part of our ecosystem, and a source of energy and creativity for all.

We host Devcon to educate and empower the community to build and use decentralized systems. It is a conference for builders of all kinds.

Our goal is to push the boundaries of possibility in our mission to bring decentralized protocols, tools, and culture to the world. Programming covers content ranging from the deeply technical to the profoundly human.

name: LA Blockchain Summit
description:
LA Blockchain Summit is the marquee conference & expo focused on blockchain investing, building, and mainstream adoption in North America. An exclusive, curated, high-impact, informative, and thought-provoking event presented by some of the world’s foremost innovators, change-makers, and prominent leaders in the web3 ecosystem.

Produced by blockchain venture studio & fund Draper Goren Holm, a partnership between Tim Draper, Alon Goren, and Josef Holm, LA Blockchain Summit is North America's preeminent web3 conference that cannot be missed. Presented over three full days, featuring insightful fireside chats with the most accomplished, powerful, and astounding list of thought leaders, builders, active investors, funds, and family offices.

name: TABConf
description: TABConf is The Atlanta Bitcoin Conference — an event for building communities, providing education, and supporting developers. This is a conference where no one can "buy" a talk. We like to think of this as the most inclusive, organic, grassroots event possible for Bitcoin.

name: The MarTech Summit
description: Thailand is one of the largest economies in Southeast Asia and the capital, Bangkok, is full of opportunities and developments. In the agenda we will discuss the status and development of marketing technology used by different companies, both local and global with a strong Thai base. This variety of perspectives in globalisation and localisation tactics will give a comprehensive view of the trends and strategies in place. In addition, the summit is guaranteed to be attended by 85% of senior leadership positions, ensuring you will learn and network with CMOs, Heads, Directors and more.

name: ETHLisbon
description: Bringing #buidl energy to Europe's crypto capital since '21

name: Web Summit 2022
description:
We’re a company from Dublin, Ireland, that holds events across the world: Web Summit in Lisbon, Web Summit Rio in Rio de Janeiro, Collision in Toronto, and RISE in Hong Kong.

Politico has said we run “the world’s premier tech conference”, the Atlantic that Web Summit is “where the future goes to be born”, and the New York Times that we assemble “a grand conclave of the tech industry’s high priests.”

At a time of great uncertainty for many industries and, indeed, the world itself, we gather the founders and CEOs of technology companies, fast-growing startups, policymakers, and heads of state to ask a simple question: Where to next?

name: ETHSanFrancisco
description: ETH San Francisco is the world’s largest hackathon. It is an opportunity to work alongside the developers, industry experts, advisers, and companies who are making the infrastructure and applications that will power the new decentralized web.

name: Solana Breakpoint
description:
The Solana ecosystem gathered in Lisbon in 2021 for the first-ever, real-life, worldwide celebration: Breakpoint. It was where the builders, enthusiasts, and dreamers making the future came to work, learn, and play.

And now, a year of explosive ecosystem growth later, Breakpoint is back with more venues, more events, and more Solana.

name: Blockchain Revolution Global
description:
After the success of the inaugural Blockchain Revolution Global (BRG) in 2019, the second edition in 2020 brought over 1,500 executives together from the world’s leading enterprises alongside foremost leaders, thinkers, and practitioners in blockchain.

Co-hosted by the Blockchain Research Institute, a global independent blockchain think-tank, and MCI Group, the world’s largest engagement agency, W3B will educate, inspire, and prepare leaders to be part of the revolutionary transformation that blockchain technology is bringing to business, government, and society.

Join us at the next Web3 Blockchain World (#W3B2022) in November 2022, the first truly worldwide enterprise leadership community for blockchain, bringing together leading thinkers, builders, and pioneers to accelerate the blockchain revolution.

name: Latin American Bitcoin & Blockchain Conference
description: Since 2013 Latin American Bitcoin & Blockchain Conference. Un proyecto de Fundación Bitcoin Iberoamérica.

name: Ghana Crypto & DeFi Summit 2022
description:
Ghana Crypto & DeFi Summit 2022, the first Ethereum Community-led summit of its kind, is brought to you by the well-established local blockchain community, DEFI AFRICA.

The agenda for this 2-day event will feature keynotes, panels, and discussions on the most exciting topics and developments from the world of blockchain, Web3, cryptocurrencies, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), and NFTs.

We are bringing local and international industry experts, builders, investors, businesses, startups, and students together under one roof to facilitate an eventful and exciting day filled with networking and educational opportunities.

name: Web3Dubai
description: The Web3Dubai Conference will feature the latest innovations in Web3 technology and modular blockchains with a focus on builder and creator tools, techniques and APIs that help you scale your project and go from 0 to 1. Whether you're a financier building a new DeFi protocol, an artist crafting a generative art NFT collection or a regen building for public goods, we've got you covered with both great workshops to upgrade your skills or get you started and talks to inspire and discover. If you're a VC, we will have a speed dating scene so you can invest in all the amazing people at the conference looking for a little help!

name: Istanbul Blockchain Week
description: The inaugural iteration of Istanbul Blockchain Week promises to be the most anticipated blockchain event of 2022 and takes place in one of Turkey’s most vibrant cities with the showcase event of the week IstanBlock 2022

name: Next Block Expo
description: Next Block Expo - one of the biggest industry events in Europe - brings founders, investors and blockchain experts together to redefine & discover the future of web3.

name: FinTech Connect 2022
description:
Now in its 9th year, Fintech Connect returns physically in November 2022. Join us and FinTech leaders from the FinTech ecosystem for two content packed days where you can hear from and meet global leaders in digital transformation, payments, blockchain and regtech who are driving the global financial technology industry forwards, all under one roof.

Whether it be a challenger bank, innovative merchant, central bank, tier one financial institution or cutting-edge tech player, come and join them at FinTech Connect 2022.

name: Blockchain expo
description:
The world-leading Blockchain Expo series will arrive at the London Olympia on the 1-2 December 2022 to host its sixth annual Global event.

It will bring together key industries from across the globe for two days of top-level content and discussion across 6 co-located events with IoT (Co-Locating 5G), AI & Big Data, Cyber Security & Cloud, Edge Computing and Digital Transformation Week

name: Art Basel Miami Beach
description: In our American show, leading galleries from five continents show significant works by masters of Modern and contemporary art, as well as the new generation of emerging stars.

name: ETHDownUnder
description: the dopest web3 hackathon in the southern hempisher

name: ETHTaipei
description: Taipei Ethereum Meetup (TEM) is a group of Taiwan-based engineers, entrepreneurs, blockchain enthusiasts, researchers, students who are interested in learning more about Ethereum blockchain technology. Founded in April 2016, TEM community members have organized hundreds of meetups, workshops, conference events on a variety of topics. Some of the topics covered include smart contract programming, protocol designs, proof-of-stake, peer-to-peer networking, DeFi products, zero-knowledge proofs, and Ethereum governance.
